Four Words.
Fun Game - Fix Queues :)

I can only recommend this game. The graphics are good and the mechanics are simple. The game is one of my favorites because its exciting and a liitle bit scary. When I played this game the first time, I was really scared. But when I play it now, its just fun. Before I bought the game to play it, I watched lets plays on Youtube and I wanted to play this game very much. When I got Steam then, it was the first game I bought. The most games are fun at the beginning but as longer as you have it, as less you play. But this game is fun yet. I play it for a really long time now and it is still really cool. You can play together with your friends. So, this game is really cool and I can only recommend it.
It's hard to learn at first but eventually you get the hang of it. Once you start having fun you most likely can't stop playing the game!

E falarem que Ã© "black-face" usar a p0rra de uma mÃ¡scara feita com o rosto de uma personagem negra Ã© ridÃ­culo, e pelo meu ver, quem reclama disso sÃ£o os verdadeiros racistas.

I would recommend it's fun, but there are loads of Killers who just camp survivors on hooks and will just sit there and stare at you until you're fucking dead and your survivor team can't do anything about it.
cool a tryhard (mais juste un peu)

It could have been a great game - if it weren`t for the lags, game crashes, everlasting loadingscreens or broken mechanics. You could try it on sale, but I would not recomment it full price. Is more fun with three friends.

Great game, if you are tired of other games and need something new and thrilling! Will keep you on ur hind legs and eyes wide open like a crack head cause this game gives you the butterflies in your stomach!

Toxic community, survivors are the worst, no killer will ever be as bad as toxic survivors, and there are plenty(survivor main). 

30% fun, I mean when its good its great. 30% aggravation because obviously, toxic community = toxic players. 20% boring, m1 simulator, duh. 20% bullshit, you know i was 6 steps through that window, shouldnt have hit me, survivors working with the killer, quitters, etc.

Game used to have seasonal exclusive cosmetics that were quite annoying and lengthy to acquire. They gave a bunch of that shit out to everyone summer 2020 for free, didnt have to work for it, nothing. Their reasoning: Due to some survivors losing that cosmetic from a glitch and they couldnt figure out who to restore in mass patch, as well as the fact they dont want their game to have exclusive cosmetics, that everyone should be able to acquire all the cosmetics through the game. That was June. July they released a brand new exclusive cosmetic, had to be there to get or its gone, and due to death in the family I wasn't able to log in, and so missed out(was the first I ever missed, right after saying they didnt want exclusive cosmetics, what a kick in the teeth \O.o/ but thats life right). So first they give the cosmetics away and say hey no exclusive, then immediately double back and release an exclusive. May play dbd again, but will never give them another dime, they don't care about our time grinding perks or cosmetics.
The gameplay is pretty ok but the game principle is nice. Overall the game is worth it's money since it's only 20$. If you want a more detailed review no.
Achei legal o jogo, vou gastar horas aqui!
Devs have still not done anything to counter tunneling and camping hooks, but they will nerf anything killer mains complain about.
Very very interesting game and it has many details and of course I recommend this because this game is nice but the game match making system is broken and really shitty
